articles.author: Matt Adams, Russ McQuaid
articles.title: 6 jurors seated so far in Delphi murders trial - FOX 59 Indianapolis
articles.description: The video above is from an earlier report ALLEN COUNTY, Ind. – Ten people have been chosen to sit on the jury in the Delphi murders trial after jury selection began Monday in Allen County. Richard Allen faces four counts of murder in connection with the Febru…
